results.title: Comparison of the anticancer effects of various statins on canine oral melanoma cells.
results.text_hl: The anticancer effects of statins on canine @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@oral melanoma@@@ cells differed in the following ascending order of IC50 values: @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@pitavastatin@@@ < @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ = @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ < @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ < @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Ishikawa T, Irie N, Tashiro J, Osaki T, Warita T, Warita K, Naito M. Comparison of the anticancer effects of various statins on canine oral melanoma cells. Vet Comp Oncol. 2023 Dec 3;():. PMID: 38044042

results.title: Tanshinone I and simvastatin inhibit melanoma tumour cell growth by regulating poly (ADP ribose) polymerase 1 expression
results.text_hl: As the results of the present study demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ cells in vitro and in vivo, it may be hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and its metabolite exert inhibitory activity on @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Huang J, Huang Y, Zhang S, Wu W, Long H, Duan X, Lai Y, Wu W. Tanshinone I and simvastatin inhibit melanoma tumour cell growth by regulating poly (ADP ribose) polymerase 1 expression Mol Med Rep. 2021 Jan;23(1):. PMID: 33179075

results.title: Statins Decrease Programmed Death-Ligand 1 (PD-L1) by Inhibiting AKT and beta-Catenin Signaling
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ also suppressed @GENE_CD274 @GENE_29126 @@@PD-L1@@@ expression in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0132 @@@A375@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:1059 @@@A2058@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ cells in a dose-dependent manner (Figure 2D,E).

results.title: The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitors, simvastatin, lovastatin and mevastatin inhibit proliferation and invasion of melanoma cells
results.text_hl: @CELLLINE_CVCL:0526 @@@SK-MEL-28@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:UD78 @@@HT144@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ cells were treated with 0.8 muM @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for 24 hours to study the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on alpha and beta integrin mediated binding.
